section.p: As with any OpenStack utility, python-cueclient requires certain information to talk to the REST API.
All parameters are required unless specified optional.

section.title: Pass Credentials on the Command Line
section.p:
To pass credentials on the command line, use the --os-username, --os-password, --os-project-name, --os-auth-url, --os-project-domain-name, --os-user-domain-name and --os-region-name parameters.
The region name parameter is optional. If the authentication service returns multiple regions, the first one in the returned list will be used. The --os-tenant-name parameter has been deprecated.

section.title: Pass Credentials as Environment Variables
section.p: To pass credentials as environment variables, use:
section.pre: export OS_USERNAME=<your_username> export OS_PASSWORD=<your_password> export OS_PROJECT_NAME=<project_name> export OS_AUTH_URL=<url_to_openstack_identity> export OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN_NAME=<project domain name> export OS_USER_DOMAIN_NAME=<user domain name> export OS_REGION_NAME

body.note: The region name parameter is optional. If the authentication service returns multiple regions, the first one in the returned list will be used.

section.title: Sample
section.p: This sample is standard authentication against Keystone v3.
